text: Va kasone az ahli kitoʙ hastand, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va on ci ʙar sumo nozil suda va on ci ʙar xudason nozil sudaast, imon dorand; dar ʙaroʙari Alloh taolo furutan hastand va ojoti Allohro ʙa ʙahoi nocize namefurusand. Inonand, ki podosason nazdi Parvardigorason [mahfuz] ast. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasi sare' ast
